main event: A UFO sighting was reported by four witnesses on April 3, 1964, in Monticello, Wisconsin. The object had four large red lights and seemed to hover before disappearing.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 3 to 4 minutes,The object appeared to have a structure resembling a small ferris wheel,The witnesses initially mistook the object for police lights,There was no sound associated with the object's movement,Each witness provided consistent descriptions despite minor details varying.
sighted object: one unidentified flying object with four large red lights
witness description: four witnesses including a graduate student and a couple traveling with them
